name: Not an Aim Trainer
storyline:
A young girl Yasma escapes into new realities through video games and her art, adventuring through different aim training scenarios; she aims to be the best.

Play through visually rich aim training levels portrayed as moments of escapism in Yasma’s world. Each collection of levels has their own stand alone narrative like Yasma saving the Princess in the handheld console game, Yasma’s drawings unveiling themselves through the levels and Yasma dance battling the characters from the console game.

Like a traditional Aim Trainer, there will be varying familiar aim training scenarios you can play through. There will also be a few unconventional levels that cater more to the story!

Customizable crosshairs and sensitivity will be available for you to have the best aim trainer experience. Game scores and high scores will also be tracked to show individual player improvement.
summary: A young girl escapes into new realities through video games and her art, adventuring through different aim training scenarios; she aims to be the best.
